segments.text: Isn't it past your bedtime already ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's getting late , and you have to wake up early tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is no way that I can fall asleep right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try listening to some soft music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It won't work . I'm nowhere close to being tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really don't care , just go to sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if I stay up and do something , until I get tired ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll be up all night if I let you do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to get to sleep eventually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to go to sleep now , so go to sleep .
segments.speaker: S1
